name: Javier Jesus Garcia Contreras

profile_section.title: Profile
profile_section.description: Javier is a Software and Mobile Developer with more than 8 years of experience in total and 6 years in the Flutter framework. He also has experience teaching High School programming classes and mentoring. He loves developing Cross-Platform and Native Apps. Also develops dependencies, libraries, and tools to improve the efficiency of the App development process. He likes to use technologies like Flutter, Firebase, Javascript, NodeJS, SwiftUI, Android Jetpack Compose, and more!

custom_sections.title: Frameworks, Architectures & Languages
custom_sections.description:
- Native Frameworks: iOS (Xcode) & Android (Android Studio and VSCode).
- Cross Platform Frameworks: Flutter, KMM, Xamarin, Appcelerator Titanium.
- Backend Frameworks: NodeJS, Micronaut & Spring Boot.
- Reactive Frameworks: RXJava & RXSwift.
- Game Engines: Unity, PlayCanvas & Unreal Engine.
- Architectures: Viper, MVVM, MVA, MVP, MVC.
- Languages: Java, Kotlin, JavaScript, C#, Objective-C, Swift, Dart.
- Declarative Languages: SwiftUI, Android Jetpack Compose, Flutter. (Also with Wrappers).

custom_sections.title: Databases, SDKs & Platforms
custom_sections.description:
- Databases: MySQL, SQLite, Firebase, MongoDB, iOS Core Data, SharedPreferences, UserDefaults, Keychain.
- SDKs and Library Integrations: Cocoapods, Swift Package Manager, Carthage, Gradle, Maven, Pubspec.
- Distribution Platforms: Google Play Console, Apple Store Connect, Firebase App Distribution.
- Cloud Platforms: GCP, AWS & Azure.
- Payment Processor Platforms: Stripe, Bill Pocket, Sr Pago, ClaroPay, MobileCard, Baz.

custom_sections.title: Tech Stack and Tools
custom_sections.description:
- Authentication: JWT, Google Auth 2.0, Facebook Auth, Apple Auth.
- Implementation of Permissions & Files Manager, Device Sensors.
- HTTP Libraries, Webviews, SVGs, PDFs & Animations.
- Use of Flavors, Schemes & BuildVariants.
- Encryption Protocols: Fingerprint SHA-1 & SHA-256, AES, Keys, Certificates.
- Maps SDKs: Google Maps, Open Street Maps & Apple Maps.
- Gitflow, Git Ignore, Code Review.
- Testing (XCTest, JUnit 4, Mockito, Sauce Labs).
- Pair Programming.
- Debugging (Manual and with Firebase Analytics & Crashlytics).
